creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long thin oval body of rattle; silver colored metal base bound through pierced holes to basket; body of rattle: spirally-wrapped cord around bottom; basket weave and braided fibers running horizontally; vertical fibers with spaces between them towards top; top is decorated with braid and straight fibers running length; small oval red and black beads visible inside basket; long hoop handle formed by single piece of curved plant material; dark brown patina on plant fibers
title: Hoop handled rattle
